data.text: Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naati, niiti ti-ziɛ ʋelei zɔlegai,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naati, niiti ti ná-kala gooiti sosu,
Naati ti la faa ɲɔu nɔpɛ kɛa,
È ɗa-leveiti kulani kɛlɛma,
Ziilɔɔi ɠɛ zèa,
Naazu gè la unfega tago ɓalaa,
Nà è maamusɛ ga sɔledai, é zìimaʋɛ,
Nà ɗa-leveiti so,
Zunu loungoi ɠa zoo ɠale, é ziɛ ɲadedai zu?
Nà è ɠaiziɛzu ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ,
Gè è-laawooi makɛgɛ zìimaʋɛ,
Mamagi ɠa è ʋɛ, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Dàkɔlɔgiti ta ɗa-leveiti kpein suɠulazu,
Gè ʋilɛ ɗa-ɠala gooiti polu, naa ɠa ɗa kòozunɛ,
Nà ɠisiɛ ɗa-leveiti su,
Nii è sɛʋɛai, naa ɠa nɛ̀ɛbɛ vaa wolai su,
Faa ʋagɔ ɠɛ bɛ̀, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui,
Gàazuʋɛ zeɠe ma,
Nà ga seikɔɠɔma nu eteai zu,
Yeeɠɛɠalai pɛ su, ɗa-leveiti kwɛɛ fai ɠa
Ɗa zelii losu waso nuiti ma, foovoo nuiti,
Ɓaaɠulamai ta bɛlɛlala vai ma ɠasɔi zeɠe ùnma,
Anɛɛ ni kundiɠiiti ta yaavai ɠilizu dàalɔɠɔma,
Ɗa-ɠala gooiti ti ga zìima vaiti,
Nà laani fufiligi zu,
Gè sɔ̀giti kpein dɛa ga ɗe, è gòoɠaaʋoteni,
Ɗa-leveiti gaaɠa ʋelei lɛ ga ze,
Ziizoolɛi ɠa gàazuɗɛi ʋuuzu.
Màaɠooza zɛɛ ʋelei ʋa.
Gè yiimazeɠea ga gè yɛ è ʋɛ ga wooɠɛɠila nu,
Nà ɠilizu ɗa-ɠala gooiti ba, niiti è ti veeni zèa,
Nà ɓizɛzu ɗa-leveiti ma ʋelei zu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, kàla ga ɗa-leveiti ma ʋelei,
Faaɠaaɠaa ɠigi ve bɛ̀, gè ɗa-lɔgi zo,
Lo tùɠɔ ɗa-leveiti ma ʋelei zu,
Zìi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛ ɗa-ɠala gooiti tuɠɔ,
Gàazuʋɛ zeɠe wafuun faiti ba,
Naa ɠɛ bɛ̀, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui,
Ɓaaɠulama vai maaɠooza bà, nii é màaluazu,
Wɔ̀in ma vaa wolai ɠa ga ɗa-leveiti!
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai ɠula kɛlɛma bɛ̀,
Nà zoo gè naati gooɠaaʋote, niiti ti ɓaaɠulazu mà,
Dàaʋɛ mina zeɠe gaama ɓɔɛi ʋolu,
Nà ɗa-lɔgi zo,
Nà ziɛ ɓɔɠɔyeemai zu,
Nà ɓɔɛ masagiti gaazu ga ɗa-ɠala gooiti,
Ɗa-leveiti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀,
Nà yeemaalesu ɗa-leveiti ma, mazɔlɔɔ ti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀.
Ɠizɛ è-laawooi zu, nii è boni mà, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui,
Nà-maanɔɠɔi zu, nà-ziilɛigi ɠa ga
Waso nuiti ti ɲɛɛɠulani nɔ̀un su,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, kìgi ɠa ɗa-leveiti su, è ti woni kaite,
Zìi ɠa ɗa ɠoloɠolo, nà faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti kaana,
Nà ɗa ɗa-leveiti maawuye,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà ɗa ɠisiɛ è zu kpidii,
Nii é ga nɔ̀un tosuʋɛ,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà bosu ʋolu, tòsuʋɛ ɠa é ga, gè ɠolo è-laawooi ʋɛ.
Gè ɠaaɓa ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ, ga gè nɛɛ è ʋɛ,
Gè ɠisiɛni sìɛ ʋeleiti su,
Nà zuvilɛzu, gè la ná laazu ɠoba,
Anɛɛ ni faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ti sòni ga ta-ʋalii,
Kua zaamai, nà ɗa wuzeɠe ga gè è maamusɛ,
Nà ga naati ti-wɔɔlai, niiti ti luazu è ʋa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai eteai kpein daavegɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è faanɛɛ ɠɛa bɛ̀, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui,
Kàla ga ɠimala ʋagɔi ta keleɠelegi,
Aisa ùnmaa ʋa yei, gè ɠakani,
È ʋagɛ, è ɠɛ ga faanɛɛ ɠɛ nui,
Waso nuiti ta zɛɛ mɔinmɔin pɛɛzu mà,
Ti yiilaaɠulugɛ,
É kpɛ̀tɛni, ùnmaayeini,
Tɔgi kulaai è-la, naa vizɔgɛ bɛ̀,
È-yeeiti ti kɛ̀ʋele ɓɛtɛa, ti sùzo,
Niiti ti luazu è ʋa, ta kà, ti ɠoozunɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, gè kwɛɛ ga ɗa-leveiti sɔlegɛ.
Ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai ɠɛ ga gàanɛɛnɛ zaɓui,
Ɗa-maawɔinɠai yei mà, nii a kɛ gè zɛnvui wo,
Unfegi yei waso nuiti ma, tɛiti ti wɔ̀inzeɠezu wafuun.
È ɠaazuluaba nuiti ti ʋa ʋolu pɔ̀ bɛ,
Nà pɔ zìi zɔle ɲɛgɛlɛin, ɗa-leveiti so fai zu,
Zìi ɠa zoolɛzu ga ɗa-ɠizogi ma vai,
Gàazuʋɛ ɓɔiɗa su ga ɗa-minazeɠegi ɠaiziɛ vai.
Gè ɠɛa eɠɛ kɔlɔ woolei é ɠoloɠolosu abu luului zu,
Folo lielegɔ ɠa ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui kɛɛzu dɛ, kɛʋelei niizu?
Waso nuiti ta zeɠei wɔɔzu tùɠɔ,
Ɗa-leveiti kpein sɔlegɛ ga nu la ti la.
Ná tago ɠɛa de, ti ʋa ùndaaʋili,
Zɛnvui ve bɛ̀ ga ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è-laawooi ɠa ná eyɛsu ɠɔ,
Ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai ɠa yɛ ná, yeeɠɛɠalaiti pɛ su.
Aniiti pɛ ta ná za, ɗa-levei zaɓui zu,
Ni ɗa-lɔgi la ɠɛni zìimani,
Eyɛsu pɛ gè la yeemaa ɗa-leveiti ma,
Nà ga ɗɔnɔ, kìzo.
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta pàa ɠeleɠelegi ɠaiziɛzu,
Gè pɛtɛgɛ ga kwɛ ka ani ʋapagi kpein ba,
Ee, ɗa-lɔgi nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀!
Ɗa-levei ɠa kɛ̀ɛzu ga ɠima nu, gè leʋe sìli nuiti ba,
Gè ɠimalai zɔlɔɔga, gè leʋe nà-kalamɔinti kpein ba,
Ɠigi ɠa mà, é leʋe kɛwola wɔlɔiti ba,
Gè la kɛɛni, kɔ̀ɠɔi ʋa ʋilɛ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ ʋele nɔpɛ ma,
Gè la maaɠoozani ɗa-leveiti ba,
Ɗa-minazeɠegi nɛɛʋɛ dàa ɠoozuʋɛ,
Ɗa-leveiti ti kɛ̀a ga ɠima nu,
È-laawooi ɠa ga lanboi kɔ̀ɠɔ wu,
Gè minazeɠeni, nà ma, nà nà-minazeɠegi zo,
Ti gòla maanɔɠɔni,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, yeezei nà-maamusɛ wooi wu,
Zɛ̀nvui ɠa faaɓaagi laawu yeenɔpɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta balii zeizu tùɠɔ,
Ɗa-ɠala gooiti ta nɔ̀un bɛ ɠɔ, ga ani ɓii gola,
Gè devea zìimaʋɛ ga gè ɠolo ɗa-lɔgiti bɛ,
Gè woovele nuiti wɔinzeɠea,
Ɗa ga dɔ̀ɔɠuzuʋɛ ta nà-kɔɔɠɔ zɛpɛgi,
À maaɠooza bà, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti,
Yeezei bù eɠɛʋelei ɗa-minazeɠegi la, naa ɠa a kɛ gè zɛnvui wo,
Ɠɛ ga pòluzeigi, naa ɠa a kɛ gè ɠizo,
Ɗa naati daaʋilisu, niiti ti zeɠezu ɗa-leveiti polu,
Ɗa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti pilisu ya, niiti ti eteai zu, eɠɛ kaʋai,
Kpùsɛi ɠa ɓalizu ga dualuagi, è seizu mà,
Nà ziɛzu ga sɔledai ta telebodai,
Ɠɛ ga pòluzeigi, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui, nà-undaanɛɛi vaa zu,
Gàazu ɓɔiɗa su ga ɗa-ɓɔbai maaɓɔun fai,
Faa ɠɛ bɛ̀, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui, eɠɛʋelei ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai la,
Nà ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui, ɠigi ve bɛ̀,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, yeeɠɛɠalai ɠa è wuzeɠe,
Nɔ̀un nà, ɗa-leveiti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀,
Gè ɗa-lɔgiti kpein pɛtɛgɛ ga ti zɔlegɛ, zeeɠaaɠwɛɛzu nɔpɛ ge la ba,
Ɗa-ɠala gooiti pagɛ gola,
È-laawooiti ma ɠulakɛlɛmai ɠa ɗa wozakalagi ve,
Ɗa-leveiti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀ gola,
Ɠaaʋote mà, è zaalai la mà,
Sɛ̀bɛlɔ, eɠɛʋelei ɗa-minazeɠegi la,
Fìe, è kùla nìmiza nuiti zeezu,
Yeezei bù ga pagɔ, nɛ̀i gè ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui,
Gàazuɗɛi ɠa yeizu eɠɛ kɔtuɗɛi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è zɔlegɛ,
Ɗa-ɠala gooiti è ti veezu,
Zìi ɠa ɠalazu kòozu,
Ɗa-minazeɠegi ma ladalai ɠulaʋɛ kɛlɛma,
Nà ga nui tosu wola la ba, ti bɛ̀lɛʋiligai,
Ɗa-lelebodai ɠa ga ɠɔoɠɔ kelei,
Kidaaʋiligi zeelia mà, nà koozuʋiligi zu,
Ɗa-ɠala gooiti sɔlegɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà wooɠulazu è ma ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ, gòoɠaaʋote,
Nà wooɠulazu è ma, ʋa, è kìzo,
Nà wuzeɠezu aisa geelaa ʋa lao, gè wooɠula è ma ga è ɓɔ bà,
Nà ɲiizu ɠaazu ɠa,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, woilo gòoi ma, ɗa-wooɠɛɠiladai zu,
Niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛzu, naati ta maaɓuɠaʋɛ bà,
Kɛlɛ, ɗa ɠa è kòba, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI,
Gè suɠwɛɛ kaite ga è ɗa-ɠala gooiti seini,
Nà-maanɔɠɔi ʋɛtɛ, è ùnmɔɔ,
Màalogi wo, è ùnmɔɔ,
Kizo fai maaɠoozaʋɛ faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ba,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗa-maawɔinɠai zuwɔɔlɔʋɛ!
Sìli nuiti ta wɔ̀inzeɠe nuiti mɔinʋɛ,
Nà wooʋalada nuiti kaana, nà ɗa ti wɔinzeɠe,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɠizɛ su ga ɗa-leveiti nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀!
È-laawooi ma ungi ɠa é ga gaamai,
Zobobɛ nuiti ta wɔ̀inzeɠezu wafuun,
Kòozunɛɛʋɛ è-laawooi ma,
Zɛɛi maayo ge la bɛ̀, gè wɔinzeɠeʋɛ,
Nà ɗa è maamusɛ ná zeizu ɠɛ lɔfela foloi ma,
Ziilɛi gola ɠa naati bɛ, niiti ɗa-lɔgi nɛai ti ʋɛ,
Kìtogɛ è ʋa, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ga ɗa kìzo,
Nà ɗa-ɠala gooiti sosu ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ,
Nà ɗa-lɔgiti ta ɗa-ɠala gooiti sosu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà-kpee wooi zeeli è ma,
Nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi zeeli è ma,
Dàkɔlɔgiti ti è maamusɛ gola,
Nɛ̀gi è-laawooi maamusɛ,
È-yeei ʋa é ɓɔ bà,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, wɔ̀inma vaa wolai ɠa ga è kìzo,
Gè yɛ vulua, gè ɗa è lɛbi,
Nà leʋeteʋesu eɠɛ baalagi nii toai ya.
